reuters.title: LAWSON SAYS HIS STERLING-TARGET COMMENTS WERE MISUNDERSTOOD AND INSIGNIFICANT
reuters.body: J.P. Morgan and Co Inc said it is raising its prime lending rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective today. Most major U.S. banks are now posting a 7-3/4 pct rate. Citibank was the first to announce an increase on Tuesday. Reuter 
